Posts.EditableText: Judging by the numbers of games waiting for moderation, there are very few active moderators on the site at the moment. As a long-standing and (mostly) sensible member of this community, I'd be happy to help if that can be arranged?
Posts.HTML: Judging by the numbers of games waiting for moderation, there are very few active moderators on the site at the moment. As a long-standing and (mostly) sensible member of this community, I'd be happy to help if that can be arranged?

Posts.EditableText: I'm still around. I do a few here and there. Need to do more.
Posts.HTML: I'm still around. I do a few here and there. Need to do more.

Posts.EditableText: It would be nice to have more people to help around.  Maybe clean up spam and what not.  If a game is not moderated first, is it unplayable by others?

Posts.EditableText: Normally you can find them under unlisted but that’s quite a hinderance.  I’m still alive but not as active as I used to be.  I recently, however, have been feeling a tug back in the text adventure direction.
